name: Nightframe
description:
To transit the window of dreams…

Process: A Sony KV-13FM12, Sony HVC-2400, Sony XV-5000, Panasonic AG-MX70P, Panasonic WJ-MX50A, Panasonic WJ-MX30, ADC V-300X and Akai PS-V20U dreaming of each other, through each other. Final output stabilized and enhanced via For.A FA-370

Direct capture via Canopus ADVC-110, edited in Adobe Premiere Pro, stabilized via For.A FA-370, played back through a Sony KV-13FM12, and rescanned via Nikon D7100 donning an Asahi Super-Multi-Coated Macro-Takumar 1:4/50, interfaced direct to computer via HDMI to Blackmagic Design UltraStudio Recorder 3G and OBS Studio.

Footage edited in Adobe Premiere Pro, then composed, colour graded and rendered in Adobe After Effects and converted with HandBrake.
